title: GELF
description:
Send structured events in GELF format to your Graylog Cluster.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/graylog-gelf/

address.title: Address
address.description:
The address (including the port) of your Graylog cluster (or any other service that receives GELF inputs).

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/graylog-gelf/

enable_tcp.title: Enable TCP
enable_tcp.description:
Set to false (recommended) to use UDP, or true to use TCP. When using TCP performance might be affected.

See: https://www.krakend.io/docs/logging/graylog-gelf/
